Title: Provides procedures relating to the adoption and submission of an annual budget by the Trustees of the Freeholders and Commonalty of the town of Southampton
Summary: Provides procedures relating to the adoption and submission of an annual budget by the Trustees of the Freeholders and Commonality of the town of Southampton.
ActClause: AN ACT to provide procedures relating to the adoption and submission of an annual budget by the Trustees of the Freeholders and Commonalty of the town of Southampton
